alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cherokee; Delaware; Mayes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 11:48AM CDT until June 08 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Delaware County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Mayes County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Adair County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Cherokee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1148 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rose, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Locust Grove... West Siloam Springs... Kansas... Oaks... Leach... Scraper... Twin Oaks... Rose... Natural Falls State Park... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
